00039 uvm_object::uvm_object() { m_name = ""; }
00040 
00041 uvm_object::uvm_object(const std::string& name) { m_name = name; }

00043 uvm_object::~uvm_object() { }

00046   m_name = name;

00049 string uvm_object::get_name() const {
00050   return m_name;

00053 std::string uvm_object::get_full_name() const {

00057 void uvm_object::print(ostream& os) const { 
00058   do_print(os);
00059 }
00060 
00061 ostream& operator<<( ostream& os, const uvm_object& obj ) {
00062   obj.print(os);
00063   return os;
00064 }
00065 
00066 ostream& operator<<( ostream& os, const uvm_object* obj ) {
00067   obj->print(os);
00068   return os;
00069 }
00070 
00071 // clone() first creates a new object and then copies the existing object
00072 // into the new object.
00073 // returns the new object
00074 
00075 uvm_object* uvm_object::clone() const {
00076   uvm_object* obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(get_type_name(),"","",true);
00077   obj->copy(this);
00078   return obj;
00079 }
00080 
00081 int uvm_object::pack(uvm_packer& p) const {
00082   do_pack(p);
00083   return p.get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00084 }
00085 
00086 int uvm_object::unpack(uvm_packer& p) {
00087   do_unpack(p);
00088   return p.get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void uvm_object::copy(const uvm_object* rhs) {
00092   do_copy(rhs);
00093 }
00094 
00095 bool uvm_object::compare(const uvm_object* rhs) const {
00096   bool b = do_compare(rhs);
00097   return b;
00098 }

00102 // default implementations of required overrides
00103 
00104 void uvm_object::do_print(ostream& os) const {
00105   os << get_type_name() << endl;
00106 }

00108 void uvm_object::do_pack(uvm_packer& ) const { }
00109 
00110 void uvm_object::do_unpack(uvm_packer& ) { }
00111 
00112 void uvm_object::do_copy(const uvm_object* rhs) { }
00113 
00114 bool uvm_object::do_compare(const uvm_object* rhs) const { return true; }
00115 
00117 
00118 static uvm_packer pp;
00119 
00120 int uvm_object::pack_bits(std::vector<bool>& v, uvm_packer* p) {
00121   //static uvm_packer pp;
00122   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00123   pack(*p);
00124   p->get_bits(v);
00125   int n = p->get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00126   return n;
00127 }
00128 
00129 int uvm_object::unpack_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v, uvm_packer* p) {
00130   //static uvm_packer pp;
00131   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00132   p->put_bits(v);
00133   unpack(*p);
00134   return v.size();
00135 }
00136 
00137 int uvm_object::pack_bytes(std::vector<char>& v, uvm_packer* p) {
00138   //static uvm_packer pp;
00139   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00140   pack(*p);
00141   p->get_bytes(v);
00142   int n = p->get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00143   return n;
00144 }
00145 
00146 int uvm_object::unpack_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v, uvm_packer* p) {
00147   //static uvm_packer pp;
00148   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00149   p->put_bytes(v);
00150   unpack(*p);
00151   return v.size();
00152 }
00153 
00154 int uvm_object::pack_ints(std::vector<int>& v, uvm_packer* p) {
00155   //static uvm_packer pp;
00156   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00157   pack(*p);
00158   p->get_ints(v);
00159   int n = p->get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00160   return n;

00164   //static uvm_packer pp;
00165   if (!p) { pp.reset(); p = &pp; }
00166   p->put_ints(v);
